title: Chat Message Shape definition
description: JSON Schema of the chat message

origin.description: Type of the message origin: either user or agent or system

name.description: Name of the user, author of the message, or the name of the person, joined to the chat

avatar.description: Absolute URL for the message's author avatar

email.description: User's email to send a transcript to

rate.description: Rating from the user for the conversation with agent
